document_data.caption: A map of Gontal depicting the mountains.
document_data.name: Gontal Pass
document_data.mainbody: '''Gontal Pass''' was the name of a narrow chasm in the mountains of [[Gontal]]. It was the only land route that connected the kingdom of Gontal with the [[Dusk Ports]] and the rest of [[Laerakond]].{{Cite dragon/366/Gontal|50, 52}}
document_data.Background: All overland trade between Gontal and the other nations of Laerakond was first organized and administered in [[Gontal City]]'s eastern gate. The families of the [[Twelvefold]] controlled most of the trade rights to use the Gontal Pass.
